briefTitle: Evaluating Outcomes of Immediate Breast Reconstruction (POBRAD-M)
officialTitle: Prospective, Multi-centre, Observational Trial Evaluating Outcomes of Immediate Breast Reconstruction Using an Implant and Acellular Dermal Matrix (SurgiMend) or Autologous Tissue
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of patients with adverse events
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Informed consent given
* Unilateral or bilateral mastectomy (therapeutic, contra lateral or prophylactic)
* Immediate reconstruction;
* Suitable for immediate implant reconstruction with ADM

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients unable to provide informed consent to participate in trial
* Patients unavailable for follow-up
* Not eligible for immediate breast reconstruction using an ADM
